title: Ok, remove the option of "not banning a champion".
body:
Especially in ranked, that shit is retarded. 

If anything, put a "Ban a random champion" option in its place as long as someone on your team isn't hovering it or something, there is absolutely no reason to not ban a champion out of 130. 

Just had an instance where 3 of my teammates didn't ban a single champion, so dumb shit got let through like Darius, Jax, and Akali and we lost the damn game.
